privileges.description: Names of privileges this user has.

troop_type.description: Description of the type of unit this user belongs to.

troop.description: Full number or name identifying the unit this user belongs to.

troop_type_id.description: ID of the unit type record

cache_scope.description: This value is used to identify the contents of the offline cache that apply to this user.

troop_number.description: Number of the unit this user belongs to.

troop_id.description: ID of the unit this user belongs to

token.description: API authentication token for this user

operations.summary: Gets authentication and privilege information for a user account

parameters.name: X-User-Token
parameters.description: The token you recieved when you authenticated the user

operations.summary: Returns detailed information about a user's privileges
